document_data.mainbody:
he Juur Dai was one of the tribes of the Bedine people that dwelled within the sands of Anauroch during the midâ€“14 century DR.
In an act of betrayal against their fellow tribesmen, the Juur Dai aligned themselves with the Zhentarim during the mercenary organizations attempt to take by force a stretch of land across Anauroch.
Jaur Dai accompanied Sabkhat el Talab
When the Zhentarim began manipulating and even assailing the Bedine tribes in the , the Juur Dai was the only tribe that did not unify under the common cause of maintaining their freedom from foreign influence. They even shared with the Zhent agents the secret location of Elahzad, the oasis that was home to a sacred temple of the Bedine.
In an act even more foul, the Juur Dai aided the Zhents in the poisoning of a Bedine oasis and their fellow tribesmen. The Juur Dai faced justice in the end, however, as they were butchered by the Zhentarim at the ruined city of Orofin, after they were no longer needed by the malevolent outlanders.
